name: Hertwill ‑ EU Dropshipping
author: Hertwill

sections.description:
Dropship premium products from European brands and suppliers, all offered at wholesale prices, with the Hertwill plugin for WooCommerce stores. The Hertwill free plugin enables you to seamlessly sync products to your store, receive automated stock updates, and enjoy automated order fulfillment. Partnering with Hertwill, top stores generate over €300K annually in sales.

Winning Products

Stand out with our unique selection: 95% of our products are manufactured in Europe, and none come from AliExpress. Every product, backed by a 2-year warranty, comes from trusted brands, ensuring quality and customer satisfaction.

Start Free

Begin your dropshipping journey with no upfront costs or subscription fees. Starting is easy—no credit card required.

Fulfillment & Quick Delivery

Let us handle the logistics. We manage all orders, eliminating the need for your own warehouse or inventory. Our products are shipped from European warehouses, guaranteeing fast delivery.

Product Information and Marketing Materials

Gain access to detailed product descriptions and automatic stock updates via our plugin. We also offer professional marketing pictures, previously available only to large retailers.

You Are Not Alone

Hertwill is more than just a provider—we’re your partner. We’re dedicated to supporting and collaborating with online stores, guiding you towards a successful business every step of the way.

Note: The Hertwill Plugin is exclusively available for online stores operating within the European Union.
sections.faq:
Is Hertwill free?

Yes, Hertwill is free.

What makes Hertwill different from other dropshipping plugins?

All the products we offer come from high-quality European brands and are shipped directly from European warehouses.

Do I need a Hertwill account to use the Hertwill WooCommerce plugin?

Yes, a Hertwill account is required to use our WooCommerce plugin. You can easily create a free account by visiting our website.

How much are top stores making partnering with Hertwill?

Top stores are making over €300K annually.

Can I sell products provided by Hertwill if I am already selling products from other suppliers?

Yes.

In which regions is Hertwill available?

Hertwill is available for online stores that sell to the European Union.

What is dropshipping?

Dropshipping is an order fulfillment method where a store doesn’t keep the products it sells in stock. Instead, the seller purchases inventory as needed from a third party—usually a wholesaler or manufacturer—to fulfill orders. In short, the order will be shipped directly to the end customer after you make the sale. All the products we provide at Hertwill are available via dropshipping.
sections.reviews:
Best dropshipping products

By juhanlev on March 28, 2024

Great products (they really look like they're from local brands) and the few issues I had were fixed quickly. Also, lots of pictures and videos were available for making ads.

Great solution by great team

By keitha22 on March 14, 2024

I started using Hertwill integration quite recently, but so far it has been great experience. The setup is super easy and logical and the integration itself works very well. What is even more important is the support and next level customer service. Hertwill team really wants you to be successful.

Easy integration and awesome customer service

By kenksta on February 28, 2024

I started my e-shop using Hertwill almost a year ago and can confirm that shop integration and syncing products to my store is super simple. I have also received great feedback from customers about the quality of the products. 
Hertwill’s team has been super helpful and really quick to answer any of my questions.

short_description: Connect your WooCommerce store to Hertwill for seamless product sync and order fulfillment through webhooks.
